cab.content: From Secretary of State to Viceroy, Foreign Department,5th April 1917. (Repeated to Sir P. Cox, Basra.) Foreign Secret. My telegram of 30th March. Civil Administration of Bagdad. Egypt can supply judicial adviser and two subordinate revenue officers. Names will be communicated as soon as possible. When should they arrive? Also proposed to appoint General Clayton from Egypt as Deputy High Commissioner,.Bagdad. Do you agree? Clayton would proceed at once.
